bio: Thomas Weiser is a Senior Project Manager & Solution Developer at Thieme Publisher Group. He possesses a wide range of skills, amongst others: software development, solution architecture, project management, security, content deployment, search-, text mining-, analytics- and semantic technologies. During his professional career he was Head of Solution Development in an E-business division, IT Manager of an Internet agency and IT Security Specialist in the finance and government sector. Most recently, Thomas has managed projects involving the use of MarkLogic Server as main technology for web- and mobile applications in the medicine sector, especially as search engine and content repository.
name: Thomas Weiser
